item.title: 15 Years
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Fifteen years ago today, on January 3rd 1996 Sarah and I were married in the Oakland Temple in Oakland, California. It’s been an amazing time. Not without challenges to be sure, but we’ve been very blessed to find ways to over come those challenges and be better people for it. We share the date of […]
item.content:encoded:
Fifteen years ago today, on January 3rd 1996 Sarah and I were married in the Oakland Temple in Oakland, California. It’s been an amazing time. Not without challenges to be sure, but we’ve been very blessed to find ways to over come those challenges and be better people for it.

We share the date of our anniversary with the birthday of one of our daughters, Alice turns 9 today.

It’s been a great 15 years Sarah and I look forward to seeing what the next 15 will bring.
